qas.question: Who have the covid-19 entry rules been lifted for?
Who will travel restrictions be lifted for?

answers.text: Authorities will lift travel restrictions for foreign nationals

qas.question: From traveling where are travel restrictions lifted?

answers.text: traveling to Sweden from other Nordic and EU countries

paragraphs.context: Government to lift COVID-19 entry rules for travelers from other countries. Authorities will lift travel restrictions for foreign nationals traveling to Sweden from other Nordic and EU countries.
